name: senior-project-sequence
description: Students clarify when the CSC 461/462 sequence starts and how long it runs.

events.content: When do people usually start the CSC 461/462 senior project? Trying to line it up with internship plans.
Most folks enroll in CSC 461 about two quarters before graduation. It's one quarter of planning (461) and one quarter of implementation (462).
If youâ€™re on a 4-year path, plan for fall+winter or winter+spring. Summer offerings exist but fill instantly.
Remember you must hit 180 units before 462. Advisors suggest keeping the quarter at 12 units max so you have bandwidth for the project.
Got it. I'll start 461 in winter so 462 wraps right before graduation.
